---
title: "jwt_missing_key_file_and_jwks_url.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines authentication settings for a system, specifically focusing on JWT (JSON Web Token) authentication. It enables authentication and configures basic session and JWT settings, but notably lacks crucial JWT configuration details such as the key file or JWKS URL.

## Symbols

### `authentication`
#### Description
The root configuration block for authentication settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets authentication as required for the system.
- Configures session settings.
- Specifies JWT as an enabled authentication method.

### `authentication.required`
#### Description
A boolean flag indicating whether authentication is mandatory for the system.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| required | boolean | Determines if authentication is required |

### `authentication.session`
#### Description
Configures session-related settings for the authentication process.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the domain for the session.
- Configures the secure flag for session cookies.

### `authentication.session.domain`
#### Description
Specifies the domain where the session is valid.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| domain | string | The domain URL for the session |

### `authentication.session.secure`
#### Description
Determines whether the session should use secure cookies.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| secure | boolean | Flag to enable or disable secure cookies |

### `authentication.methods`
#### Description
Defines the authentication methods available in the system.

### `authentication.methods.jwt`
#### Description
Configures the JWT authentication method.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables JWT authentication.

### `authentication.methods.jwt.enabled`
#### Description
A boolean flag to enable or disable JWT authentication.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Flag to enable or disable JWT authentication |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| authentication.required | boolean | true | Determines if authentication is required |
| authentication.session.domain | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The domain URL for the session |
| authentication.session.secure | boolean | false | Flag to enable or disable secure cookies |
| authentication.methods.jwt.enabled | boolean | true | Flag to enable or disable JWT authentication |

## TODOs
This configuration file is missing crucial JWT settings:
1. JWT key file: A file containing the secret key or public key used to verify JWT signatures.
2. JWKS URL: The URL of the JSON Web Key Set, which provides the public keys for verifying JWT signatures.

These missing elements are essential for proper JWT authentication and should be added to make the configuration complete and functional.
